conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway. Multiple wall surfaces and interior volumes are clearly visible.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of 3D fundamentals with clear wall thickness and clean cutaway.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate layout. Door swing arcs in the 3D model are a rare and helpful detail. Slight scale minor variance in window widths.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture matches the 2D layout perfectly, including bathroom fixtures and kitchen counter appliances.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. Minor point deduction for procedural artifacts on some wall top faces.

detected_errors.description: Balcony railing segments slightly vary from the 2D dashed line representation.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically sound 3D conversion that preserves even the smallest architectural details from the original 2D floor plan.
